means: 对任何事物均感兴趣的

word_mean: 杂食的：靠植物和动物维持生存的

sentence.Network_en: As a child, Coleridge developed omnivorous reading habits.
sentence.Network_cn: 柯尔律治从孩提时期便养成了广泛阅读的习惯。

sentence.Network_en: She has always been an omnivorous reader.
Brown bears are omnivorous, eating anything that they can get their paws on.
sentence.Network_cn: 棕熊是杂食性动物，抓到什么吃什么。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 杂食性(omnivorous)，水果占60%，草木占30%，肉类占10%。矫建灵活，擅于爬树及采摘果叶。
20个用以描述动物的形容词-英语点津 ... 16. Cute 可爱的 17. Omnivorous 杂食的 18. Nocturnal 夜行的.
词根及词缀 ... devour v 吞吃 omnivorous a 杂食性的 herbivorous a 食草的.

list.abs: snakes are omnivorous animals .蛇是一种杂食动物。
杂食性昆虫(omnivorous insect)。 17、按照昆虫取食的食物种类的多少,可把昆虫分为几类? 多食性昆虫(polyphagous insect):棉铃虫寡食性昆虫(oligophagous insect).
An omnivorous person or animal., 杂食动物或杂食的人.
omnivorous ant of tropical and subtropical America that can inflict a painful sting .美国热带和亚热带地区的杂食性蚂蚁，被其叮咬会引起疼痛。

entry.def: An omnivorous person or animal eats all kinds of food, including both meat and plants.

example.ex: Brown bears are omnivorous, eating anything that they can get their paws on.
example.tran: 棕熊是杂食性动物，抓到什么吃什么。

entry.tran: （在某一方面）兴趣广泛的，什么都喜欢的
entry.def: Omnivorous means liking a wide variety of things of a particular type.

example.ex: As a child, Coleridge developed omnivorous reading habits.
example.tran: 柯尔律治从孩提时期便养成了广泛阅读的习惯。

means.word_mean: 1. feeding on both plants and animals

stems_affixes.value_cn: 食虫的, 食虫动植物的
创造一切的, 有无限创造力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: omni全部,到处+fic做+ent……的→做出全部东西
omni全部,到处+potent有力的→adj.全能的
omni全部,到处+present出现的→adj.无所不在的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 全知的, 无所不知的
stems_affixes.word_buile: omni全部,到处+scient有知识的→adj.全知的, 无所不知的;n.无所不知者
omni全部,到处+bus汽车→n.公共汽车
omni全部,到处+scient有知识的→adj.全知的, 无所不知的;n.无所不知者
omni全部,到处+itude状态→omnitude全的状态→无所不包的
